Detailed Description

Akaike's Information Criterion.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plNodeScoreAIC::plNodeScoreAIC ( plDataDescriptor &  data_desc)
explicit

Construct a node score object using Akaike's Information Criterion, for evaluating a model's performance with respect to a dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.
